subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Danell Leyva and Yin Alvarez, Leyva’s stepfather and coach, are closer to their dream of an Olympic gold medal — something the two have been envisioning for years.
snippet: Danell Leyva and Yin Alvarez, Leyva’s stepfather and coach, are closer to their dream of an Olympic gold medal — something the two have been envisioning for years.
